alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 3:37AM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible. Locally higher amounts possible on west-facing slopes above 9,000 feet. * WHERE...Jemez Mountains, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, Chuska Mountains, and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Check road conditions before heading out. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Jemez Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; West Central Mountains
